alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Orange County through 615 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Hart, or near Avalon Park, moving north at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Wedgefield, Avalon Park, University Of Central Florida and Goldenrod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
